title: Finding the Right Someone: How to Navigate Relationships Pt 1
description:
Author and pastor Ben Stuart wrote the book on how to have a successful relationship — literally! Sadie and Christian started their relationship off on the right foot thanks to Ben’s book, "Single, Dating, Engaged, Married: Navigating Life and Love in the Modern Age." Ben talks through a few signs that your relationship may be heading in the wrong direction, not looking to other people for what you can only get from God, and the purpose of singleness and how it can be a gift. Ben and Sadie also discuss finding the right someone the right way and why sex is like a fire. Then, Sadie and Christian take a call from a listener to give her some advice on staying positive in a negative world.
